client.gui.marketingrepresentative

Class UpdateCustomerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.gui.marketingrepresentative.UpdateCustomerController

  • public class UpdateCustomerController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class responsible on update customer details and etc, the class consist of 4 screens: Customer Details Pane - Update the details on 'customer' and 'users' tables. Credit Card Pane - Update/Insert on 'credit_card' table. Vehicle Pane - Update/Insert on 'vehicles' table. Purchase model - Update on 'purchase_model' table.
    Version:
    - Final.
    Author:
    Or Yom Tov

      This method resposible to update all the customer details on Json object and Takes the data to the server for update the DB.

        public void load(javafx.scene.layout.Pane changePane)

      • updateDetailsInDB

        public void updateDetailsInDB(java.lang.String customerID)
        This method resposible to update all the customer details on Json object and Takes the data to the server for update the DB.
        Parameters:
        customerID - - Customer ID to take data for this current ID.

      • updateVehicles
